channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Massive potholes all down the road, 15th April
item.description:
Large potholes particularly towards fairview road, can't miss them as you have to drive on the wrong side of the road to avoid
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Victoria Place, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress fly tipped rear of shops, 15th April
item.description:
A mattress has been moving around the rear of Caernarvon court for at least 6 months. It’s now in a very rough condition and has been moved in to the far corner by the garages, with brambles growing over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Montgomery Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on road & pavement School Road, near Merryfellow car park, 15th April
item.description:
Pothole on road & pavement School Road, near Merryfellow car park

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3A, School Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes and badly repaired holes for a stretch of road from the begining of castle hill drive to the second turning leading to lasne crescent., 15th April
item.description:
From the start of Castle hill drive to the junction that leads to Lasne Crescent.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Castle Hill Drive, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several deep potholes for the length of the road, 15th April
item.description:
Please can this be investigated and looked at rather than just ‘closed’ the road is appalling.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Roberts Road, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes and road damage all the way up Roberts road, 15th April
item.description:
Sever potholes in and around this area that will need looking at
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Roberts Road, Noverton, Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 15th April
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet
